channel.title: Basic info help please
channel.description:
i have a few basic questions so i will fire away
how do i start my server up as in like change all the ip's over and connect it all up so its running for me on my ip and port number and everything
also what do i do to actually login to my server
is there a tut on this already somewhere? because i couldnt find it

item.title: Basic info help please
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

To change the ip and port
open your client folder find client.java
inside that search… ip or server
for the port search 43594 or 55555 and change it to whichever port
to login change the ip of the client to 127.0.0.1 (localhost) start up the server
comple the client then start it
log in with anyname and have fun

Read full topic
